column4: Hi, I am a complete newbie to Linux, I have tried before to get this laptops wireless card working and failed. I was hoping you all could assist me?
Ubuntu 9.04 which is released this Thursday,  I have read will have better supppourt for atheros wireless cards
no it's a type not a make
oh wubi nice to try, but  you should partition 9.04 :)  I think
well you try your hardware on the Live CD first,  as I said that's this Thursday
